page.title: 05Eccles Precinct survey 1
page.content:
We conducted a survey to find out what the public thought of Eccles Precinct. We asked fifty people and here are the results.
10% came less than once a week 72% came more than once a week 18% came just once a week
52% live less than a mile away 34% live more than a mile away 14% live about a mile away
50% said they walked 24% caught the bus 26% travelled by car
50% came to shop for food 2% came mainly for non-food 42% came for a mixture of food and non-food items 6% came for other things
